Both movies are great choices!

Given your preferences for a police genre movie, I'd highly recommend "Roses Are Red" starring Tricky and Dan Hicks. The plot revolves around a paroled convict impersonating a local district attorney while the real one is kidnapped, creating quite an intriguing twist!

If you're up for something more action-packed, there's also "The Fifth Element" featuring Bruce Willis and Milla Jovovich. This film, set in a colorful future, has a mysterious cosmic weapon at its core that keeps evil forces at bay – it could be an exciting watch! Enjoy the movies!
